org.ldaptive.referral

Class AbstractReferralHandler<Q extends Request,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.referral.AbstractReferralHandler<Q,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - type of ldap request
    S - type of ldap response
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<Q,Response<S>>, ReferralHandler<Q,S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddReferralHandler, CompareReferralHandler, DeleteReferralHandler, ModifyDnReferralHandler, ModifyReferralHandler, SearchReferralHandler

    public abstract class AbstractReferralHandler<Q extends Request,S>
extends Object
implements ReferralHandler<Q,S>
    Common implementation of referral handling.

      • followReferral

        protected Response<S> followReferral(Connection conn,
                                     Q request,
                                     String[] referralUrls)
                              throws LdapException
        Follows the supplied referral URLs in order until a SUCCESS or REFERRAL_LIMIT_EXCEEDED occurs. If neither of those conditions occurs this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        conn - the original operation occurred on
        request - of the operation that produced a referral
        referralUrls - produced by the request
        Returns:
        referral response
        Throws:
        LdapException - if a REFERRAL_LIMIT_EXCEEDED in encountered

      • handle

        public HandlerResult<Response<S>> handle(Connection conn,
                                         Q request,
                                         Response<S> response)
                                  throws LdapException
        Description copied from interface: Handler
        Handle the supplied result.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface Handler<Q extends Request,Response<S>>
        Specified by:
        handle in interface ReferralHandler<Q extends Request,S>
        Parameters:
        conn - connection the operation was executed on
        request - executed by the operation
        response - produced from the operation
        Returns:
        handler result
        Throws:
        LdapException - if handling fails

      • handle

        public HandlerResult<Response<S>> handle(Connection conn,
                                         Q request,
                                         String[] referralUrls)
                                  throws LdapException
        Implementation that does not require the response.
        Parameters:
        conn - the operation occurred on
        request - the operation executed
        referralUrls - encountered in the operation
        Returns:
        handler result
        Throws:
        LdapException - if an error occurs following referrals
